fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Tulaytullah's Remembrance__ - Wanderer can utilize the passive really well, able to fully utilize the attack speed and attack buffs.

__Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds__ - A good stat stick and decent synergy.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Widsith__ - One of his best weapons, a bit of RNG but can out damage most 5-Star options.
__Solar Pearl__ - A decent stat stick.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Anemo DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT DMG/Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Yuuban Meigen
**2)** Elemental Skill: Song of the Wind
**3)** Elemental Burst:  Five Ceremonial Plays

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If utilizing a shield, 4-Piece Retracing Bolide will outperform the third best set mentioned.

4-Piece Viridescent Venerer performs at the same level as the third best set mentioned.

Wanderer should only be using Elemental Burst 2/3 times.
